A2 [ U ] a game in which two teams use their hands to hit a large ball backwards and forwards over a high net without allowing the ball to touch the ground: In physical education, we play volleyball or do exercises. She's upset she didn't make the volleyball team.
Anadolu Agency/Contributor/Anadolu Agency/GettyImages
[ C ] the ball used in the game of volleyball: We have volleyballs - we just don't have a net! He took three steps, then hit the volleyball.
Spiderstock/E+/GettyImages
